_comment: Using _items to create the markers on the map.
title: GeoViewer
body: GeoViewer is a component that allows you to display a map with markers and popups. It uses Leaflet.js as the mapping library.
instruction: Click on the map to see the popup.

_items.name: Argentina
_items.description: Argentina is a country in South America, bordered by Chile to the west and south, Bolivia and Paraguay to the north and Brazil and Uruguay to the northeast.

properties.name: Argentina
properties.description: Argentina is a country located in South America. It is known for its diverse geography, which includes the Andes mountains, Pampas grasslands, and extensive coastlines along the Atlantic Ocean.
